summary: Hunter\'s Rest a simple home for lonely hunter\'s of the wild
descriptionHtml:
Hunter\'s Rest a simple home for lonely hunter\'s of the wild, place up in the mountins and not so far aways lies a great hunting site.

I plan to update this mod so it get\'s even better, so ideas are welcomed:)
If you are instressed to join this project you are welcomed for that to just send me a mail

Bugs:
None known so far
----------------------
Updates:
None made yet
----------------------
Furture Plans
Make Hunter\'s Rest even more home like by adding extra houses or perhaps if people want make it a little village:)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Install
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\                                    
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstall

simply remove the Hunter\'s Rest esp file:)
author: CrazyWolfGamer
